verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Danya Danya yesu namamu jaya jaya prabhu namamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu perata mukthi dorukun Prabhu namame suddhi parachun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu namame yento priyamu dukitula kasraya namam{/lang-eng}
